ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.SERVICE_SUSPENDED_1: Zataakse regular services have been suspended due to lockdown
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.SERVICE_SUSPENDED_2: You can order essentials goods from merchants near you, by recording a voice message or clicking picture of item list. Check samples.
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.WRITE_PRODUCT_AND_QUANTITY: Take picture of your order list
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.PRESS_THE_GREEN_BTN: Press this green button to start recording your order in the format Brand - Item - Quantity. Check sample order
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.PRESS_THE_GREEN_BTN_PIC: Press this green button to click a picture of your order list in the format Brand-Item-Quantity
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.CANCEL_TO_RECORD: Cancel to record your order again
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.SELECT_STORE: Select a particular store in your vicinity by clicking on the red spots
ESSENTIAL_SERVICE.MODAL_TEXT: We will reach out to you once we launch in your locality

NOT_SERVICEBLE.RECOMMEND_TEXT: You may refer merchants at your location by providing their business name and mobile number
NOT_SERVICEBLE.NO_SERVICE: We are not serving at this location
NOT_SERVICEBLE.CHANGE_LOCATION_TEXT: You may enter your location in the address bar above.

CART.VEHICLE_TEXT: You can add vehicle information in profile section
CART.ORDER_SUCCESS_DIALOG: Order Placed Successfully. You can check your order status from the menu
